channel.title: Fan Stuff on The ChaosGrenade

item.title: [SIGIL & SHADOW] Invoking the Fanbase
item.description:
Header Art by Luis F. Sanz

First off, apologies for the delay on anything new regarding Sigil & Shadow.
While I’ve been distracted trying to get my act together going forward in 2022, some really cool peeps have put together some handy stuff for Sigil & Shadow!

item.title: [SIGIL & SHADOW] Resources
item.description: This post will be constantly updated with useful documents, play aids and character sheets for Sigil & Shadow as they become available. Check back often, and feel free to email me any cool homebrewed content you wish to share.
